Row.Text: [BLIST][LI]All [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] [B]Warehouse Buildings[/B] apply to [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] [B]Mountain Terrain[/B], but they cost [B]+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Maintenance[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Boudhanath[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Nepal's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
All [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Buildings apply to [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain Terrain, but they cost +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Maintenance.
